scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && echo ryosuzuki.org > build/CNAME && touch build/.nojekyll && mv build/static/publications build/ && mv build/static/cv/cv.pdf build/ && git add build/
scripts.push: git subtree push --prefix build origin gh-pages
scripts.force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix build master`:gh-pages --force
